ComicInfo.Summary: Juliette duals with Dina. Adalind escapes. Latimer takes Juliette and Trubel hostage but Juliette frees herself. Juliette and Rosalee track Adalind to the jail where Izzy is being kept. Chained to a radiator, Trubel and Dina agree to help each other and Trubel learns the Keystone amplifies hexenbiest powers. While Juliette talks to Izzy hoping to learn where the rest of the map to the Keystone is, the jail is broken into.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-29 15:31:27. [CVDB571696] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 08:31:08. [Issue ID 1661769]
ComicInfo.Characters: The Weird Sisters [Dina,Bobby,Adalind Schade,Rosalee Calvert,Juliette Silverton,Zoe,Greta],Theresa Rubel [Trubel],Latimer,Isabelle Carpenter [Izzy]
